sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import PropTypes from "prop-types";

import Header from "../../../../components/Header";
import {
  Container,
  Column,
  FlipCard,
  FlipCardInner,
  CardFront,
  CardBack,
  Form,
  WrapperInput,
  SmallLabel,
  CardInput,
  Row,
  CVVInput,
  DateInput,
  Input,
  Buttons,
  Back,
  Button,
  CreditCard,
  Flag,
  NameCard,
  WrapperDate,
  ValidDate,
  CardNumber,
  Emblem,
  Bar,
  CVV,
} from "./styles";

function DesktopForm({ rotate, cvv, onGrantLostFocus }) {
  return (
    <Container>
      <Column>
        <FlipCard rotate={rotate}>
          <FlipCardInner rotate={rotate}>
            <CardFront>
              <Emblem />
              <CardNumber>0000 0000 0000 0000</CardNumber>
              <WrapperDate>
                <SmallLabel fontSize={12} color="#fff">
                  VALID
                </SmallLabel>
                <ValidDate>00/0000</ValidDate>
              </WrapperDate>
              <NameCard>{"daniel braz LOPES".toUpperCase()}</NameCard>
              <Flag />
            </CardFront>
            <CardBack>
              <Bar />
              <CVV>000</CVV>
            </CardBack>
          </FlipCardInner>
        </FlipCard>
      </Column>
      <Column>
        <Form>
          <WrapperInput>
            <SmallLabel>número do cartão</SmallLabel>
            <CardInput placeholder="0000 0000 0000 0000" />
          </WrapperInput>
          <Row marginTop={30}>
            <WrapperInput>
              <SmallLabel>CVV</SmallLabel>
              <CVVInput
                placeholder="000"
                value={cvv}
                onChange={() => onGrantLostFocus()}
              />
            </WrapperInput>
            <WrapperInput>
              <SmallLabel>expiração</SmallLabel>
              <DateInput placeholder="00/0000" />
            </WrapperInput>
          </Row>
          <WrapperInput marginTop={30}>
            <SmallLabel>nome do proprietário</SmallLabel>
            <Input placeholder="nome do proprietário" />
          </WrapperInput>
        </Form>
      </Column>
      <Buttons>
        <Back>voltar</Back>
        <Button>
          <CreditCard />
        </Button>
      </Buttons>
    </Container>
  );
}

DesktopForm.propTypes = {
  rotate: PropTypes.bool,
  cvv: PropTypes.string,
  onGrantLostFocus: PropTypes.func,
};

DesktopForm.defaultProps = {
  rotate: false,
  cvv: "",
  onGrantLostFocus: () => {},
};

export default DesktopForm;
